name: Build Your Army
description:
Play as Fibossa Barbochi, a sulphurous prince, looking for his own army of soldiers to realize his mysterious plan. Walk his land in search of ten soldiers to help him reach his goal. But beware of the traps on your way and remember: appearances are deceptive!

____________

Incarnez Fibossa Barbochi, un prince à la réputation sulfureuse, qui cherche à former sa propre armée de soldats afin de réaliser son plan mystérieux. Parcourez ses terres à la recherche de dix soldats pour l’aider à atteindre son but. Mais faites attention aux pièges sur votre route et n’oubliez pas : les apparences sont trompeuses !

____________

A gamejam project made with Unity3d.

Topic : Deceptive appearances!

Deadline : 2,5 days

Language : English

____________

Credits:

Developement - game design : haticehina and moonzart

Asset Store : Neuroconnect, TurkCheeps

Kuroko No Basket
